text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Niba ababyeyi banyu, abana banyu, abavandimwe banyu, abo mwashakanye, imiryango yanyu, imitungo mwahashye, ibicuruzwa mutinya ko byahomba ndetse n'amazu mwishimiye ari byo mukunze cyane kurusha Allah n'Intumwa ye, ndetse no guharanira inzira ye; ngaho nimutegereze kugeza Allah azanye itegeko rye (ibihano).” Kandi Allah ntayobora abantu b’ibyigomeke
